success.title: Thank You!
success.text:
We have received your message,
We will contact you via WhatsApp for more info.

form.title: Customer Preference Form
form.text2: Logo order procedure Read
form.text3: Contact? Click here

label.phone: Phone number/ WhatsApp that can be contacted
label.feelings: Please mention your special requirements. Also what feelings do you want your logo to provoke
label.product: Tell us more about your audience, organisation or product
label.use_logo: Where all will you use your logo?
label.type_logo: Select the types of logos you need
label.attribute: Select the style attribute of logos you need
label.meeting: Do you need a more detailed discussion through a virtual meeting with our team?

placeholder.feelings: E.G. I want a minimalist logo of my initial name, it should be modern and futuristic

small.slogan_next: Slogans you want to include in your logo
small.competitor: If possible, please provide their links as well
small.choose: You can choose more than one
small.attribute: Slide the button to describe how you want your logo to look
small.meeting_next: You can set the virtual meeting time according to your wishes

modal.title: Procedure
modal.text1: Clients must fill out the form provided.
modal.text2: The client pays an advance of 50% of the set price.
modal.text3: Our team will provide 3 logo concepts.
modal.text6: The client pays the entire price.
modal.text7: Our team will send files via email.
